title: A New Kind of Ranching Is Taking Its Place at the Ponderosa!

subtasks: Drive to the burn unit.
Bring hay to the big Joe herd.
Roll out hay for the big Joe herd.
Inspect newly cleaned pond for bison.
Provide grassy alfalfa and native hay for the big Joe herd.

tasks.task: Move wild turkeys to a new mobile pen.
subtasks: Assemble the mobile chicken unit.
Transport turkey cage from original location.
Capture and load wild turkeys into the mobile pen.
Transfer wild turkeys into the mobile pen.
Secure the mobile pen with a tarp.
Acknowledge Happy Farmer's support.
